text: Not many would even consider to unite the warmongering ambigious tribes of the North, yet Harald is confident he will be crowned the Ever-King.
Known as a Northern Strategist, Harald excels in planning campaigns in frigid climates. His armies move efficiently through icy terrains, gaining advantages in Norscan territories.
With unnatural strength Harald requires nothing but his bear hands to snap the spines of even the fiercest of foes. A sight but few manage to stomach.
Known for his ruthless governance, Harald imposes an Iron Fist Rule that quells dissent and reduces the chance of rebellions in his expanding domain.

Harald leaves an indelible mark on the legacy of Graeling conquest. This skill accelerates the process of assimilating conquered provinces into the Graeling Kingdom, ensuring swift integration and stability.
As the Warlord of the Graelings, Harald's authority on the battlefield is unmatched. His presence inspires troops to fight with heightened morale and effectiveness during campaigns and battles.
Harald's ambition fuels the expansion of the Graeling Dominion. Newly conquered territories under his rule experience accelerated growth and swift assimilation into the burgeoning kingdom
Harald Whyrlas aspires to unite all Norscan tribes under the banner of the Graeling Kingdom. His diplomatic prowess and vision for a united Norscan realm improve relations with neighboring faction
Graeling beserkers welcome mutations with open arms, considering nothing shy but the greatest gift to recieve from their patrons.
The Bigger they are the haralder they fall..

The Frostrend Cleaver, a colossal greatsword of the Graeling tribe, passes from Jarl to Jarl, embodying the lineage's unwavering strength. Its icy blade tells tales of victories etched in frost, each swing a testament to the tribe's indomitable spirit. An heirloom of power, the Frostreaver gleams with the echoes of heroes long past, guiding the Graeling leaders through the relentless dance of battles and winters.
The enormous Harald has an ambition to unite all the tribes of Norsca into one nation, using his size as intimidation to any daring enough to rise against him.
With the unparalled might of his swing, Harald uses the Frostrend Cleavers to shatter the fiercest of weaponry.
Leadership: %+n for each confederated Norscan Tribe
Attribute: Causes Terror when fighting against Norscan factions
Bonus vs Large: %+n for Skin Wolf units
Weapon strength: %+n% for Marauder Berserker units
He who seeks to unite all Norscan tribes is either foolish or brave, or perhaps both.
